price: 安拉是慈爱他的众仆的，他供给他所欲供给的人，他确是至刚的，确是万能的。
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَطِيفُۢ بِعِبَادِهِۦ يَرۡزُقُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu laṭīfun biʿibādihi yarzuqu man yashāu wahuwa al-qawiyu al-ʿazīzu
